concept.title: Encoded GDSL
concept.shortdesc: How to encode GDSL into a format for transmittal by http

conbody.p:
Upon successful validation of the code:
Click Encode, and if no error occurs, then the button's background color will change to green. This encodes the GDSL into a format that be transported via HTTP and KML.
Click Save Encoding to copy the encoded GDSL to memory and then paste it into the Capabilities.kml file on the GDS server.
